column5: Are the Beer Stores open on Sunday, and are there any along 17 from the Sault to Wawa. I believe there is one in Wawa but I don't know if it is open on Sunday. Also, can you buy liquor at the Beer Store? Any help is appreciated. Thanks
Beer and Loquor stores are open Sunday. There are numerous "Agency Liquor Stores" along your route. All prices are the same set by the LCBO.
